  • Other Projects

Since Freedoom is free, some other projects have used some of Freedoom’s assets. We think this is great. Here’s the ones we know of. If you find any others, please let us know by filing an issue or pull request on the website project at GitHub.

  • Barista (ZDoom mod)

  • Zombie Panic

  • Terrorized

  • Gloomy Dungeons

  • Nocturne In Yellow

  • Doominator Wave Survival
